title: Classic Wedding Package
description: Our classic wedding package includes venue booking, decoration, catering, and photography services.
overview: The Classic Wedding Package offers everything you need for a timeless and elegant wedding. Our team will take care of every detail, from selecting the perfect venue to capturing beautiful moments through photography.

title: Luxury Wedding Experience
description: Experience a luxurious wedding with our premium package featuring a grand venue, gourmet catering, and personalized concierge services.
overview: Indulge in a world of opulence with our Luxury Wedding Experience. From lavish venues to exquisite cuisine, our team will ensure that your wedding is a grand affair filled with luxury and sophistication.

title: Intimate Beach Wedding
description: Celebrate your love with an intimate beach wedding, including a seaside ceremony, beachside dinner, and romantic sunset photoshoot.
overview: Escape to a tranquil paradise with our Intimate Beach Wedding package. Exchange vows by the sea, dine under the stars, and cherish the beauty of your special day with a romantic photoshoot.

title: Vintage Wedding Charm
description: Capture the essence of vintage charm with our package, featuring rustic decor, antique props, and a live jazz band.
overview: Step back in time with our Vintage Wedding Charm package. Let the ambiance of rustic decor, live jazz music, and antique props transport you to a bygone era on your special day.

title: Destination Elopement
description: Escape to a picturesque destination for an intimate elopement with a dedicated photographer and private ceremony.
overview: Simplify your wedding with our Destination Elopement package. Exchange vows in a romantic destination of your choice, with a dedicated photographer capturing the essence of your love.

title: Themed Fairytale Wedding
description: Create a fairytale wedding with our themed package, including costume rentals, fantasy decor, and a fairytale horse-drawn carriage.
overview: Turn your wedding into a magical storybook with our Themed Fairytale Wedding package. Walk down the aisle in fantasy attire, with a horse-drawn carriage adding a touch of enchantment.

title: Traditional Bangladeshi Wedding
description: Experience the rich traditions of an Indian wedding with our package, including henna artists, traditional cuisine, and cultural performances.
overview: Celebrate love and tradition with our Traditional Indian Wedding package. Immerse yourself in the vibrant colors, flavors, and rituals of an authentic Indian wedding experience.

title: Rustic Barn Wedding
description: Celebrate your love in a rustic barn setting with wooden decor, country-style catering, and a barn dance party.
overview: Embrace the charm of a Rustic Barn Wedding. Dance the night away in a picturesque barn setting, with country-style catering and delightful hayrides adding to the festivities.

title: Garden Elegance Wedding
description: Embrace the beauty of nature with a garden wedding featuring lush floral arrangements, outdoor dining, and a live string quartet.
overview: Experience the Garden Elegance Wedding, surrounded by the beauty of nature. Revel in lush floral arrangements, the sweet sounds of a string quartet, and outdoor dining in a charming garden setting.

title: Bohemian Dream Wedding
description: Celebrate your love in a bohemian style with our package featuring dreamcatcher decor, a drum circle, and a fire dancing performance.
overview: Let your love take center stage with our Bohemian Dream Wedding. Immerse yourself in a world of dreamcatcher decor, rhythmic drum circles, and mesmerizing fire dancing.

title: City Chic Wedding
description: Experience an elegant city wedding with a rooftop ceremony, gourmet urban cuisine, and a live jazz quartet.
overview: Elevate your love story with a City Chic Wedding. Exchange vows against a breathtaking city skyline, savor gourmet urban cuisine, and dance the night away to live jazz melodies.

title: Winter Wonderland Wedding
description: Create a magical winter wedding with snowflake decor, a cozy fireside reception, and a horse-drawn sleigh ride.
overview: Embrace the enchantment of winter with our Winter Wonderland Wedding. Let snowflake decor, cozy fireside moments, and a horse-drawn sleigh ride create memories that will last a lifetime.
